title: As climate change worsens, the United States under-delivers on finance promises to hardest hit countries - National Priorities Project
content: As climate change worsens, the United States under-delivers on finance promises to hardest hit countries  National Priorities Project
description: On the campaign trail, Joe Biden promised to “lead a major diplomatic push to raise the ambitions of countries’ climate targets.” But the U.S. continues to under-deliver on climate finance as military spending soars.
